nodes.text: Yideg was a commentator on Gundark's Gear Datalog during the early years of the New Republic. While guarding a client, Yideg used a sonic rifle to remove two bounty hunters disguised as alien dignitaries from a party. Yideg used the sonic rifle to take them out, earning a bonus for the work.

Yideg was one of the first in line to purchase BlasTech's DL-6H heavy blaster pistol. Yideg wanted to get a weapon with a longer range, and was pleasantly surprised to find that the weapon not only had double the range, but also had the weight and feel of a heavy blaster pistol.
